name: Super Mutator
description:
SUPER MUTATOR

Tired of the good old sameness of not chaotically shifting in body proportions in daily alien life?

Mutate NOW after every dash and get rid of those pesky space parasites!

Grow a big head, long legs, a huge tongue on where your head should be or blades for arms.

How to play

  • [W A S D] to move
  • [LMB] to attack
  • [SPACE] to dash to cursor - and give up your old body
  • [Q] to switch the next preferred mutation

Credits

  • https://github.com/NiklasPor
  • https://twitter.com/ElNikkino

Sound Effects: Ultimate SFX bundle from an asset store.

Lore

[ TRANSMISSION ::: START ]
We are interrupting this broadcast for an important intermission:

Parasites are emerging out of every corner of our planet.
The local wildlife is heavily affected.

Mission control has launched a biological weapon to seek and destroy the parasite's god emperor Evil Gaze and put an end to the invasion.

Do not leave your homes and keep your device on for further information.
[ TRANSMISSION ::: END ]
